articles.title: Microsoft's new AI chatbot has been saying some 'crazy and unhinged things' - MPR News
articles.description: After Microsoft's powerful AI chatbot verbally attacked people, and even compared one person to Hitler, the company has decided to rein in the technology until it works out the kinks.
